ðŸš€ Faster & More Stable Calls

  • Instant Connections: 1-to-1 calls now connect much faster thanks to a new real-time signaling system.
  • Bulletproof Room Leave: Completely fixed the "stuck in room" bug - leaving a call now always works reliably.
  • Chat History Saved: Your 1-to-1 chat history is now safely preserved when you leave a call.
  • Device Selection: You can now properly select and switch your camera, microphone, and speakers during calls.
  • Auto-Recovery: The app now automatically recovers from temporary connection issues without requiring a restart.
